content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Bartolomeo., Bartolomeo just said to you: '"Ah, Marco! That's settled nicely. Much appreciated!"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Bartolomeo. Glad to be of service."

You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Bartolomeo., Bartolomeo just said to you: '"Ah, Marco! Grazie! That was… timely, I must say. Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Bartolomeo! Glad I could help. Carry on well!"
